name: 3dMean
author: AFNI Developers
description: Takes the voxel-by-voxel mean of all input datasets; designed to be faster than 3dcalc.

inputs.description: Print out some information along the way
inputs.name: Verbose Flag

inputs.description: Sets the prefix of the output dataset
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Sets the datum of the output dataset
inputs.name: Datum

inputs.description: Force scaling of the output to the maximum integer range
inputs.name: Force Scale Flag

inputs.description: Force scaling of the output to the maximum integer range, with uniform scaling factor for each sub-brick
inputs.name: Global Scale Flag

inputs.description: Don't do any scaling on output to byte or short datasets. Only use if you want the output dataset to be integer-valued.
inputs.name: No Scale Flag

inputs.description: Use only non-zero values for calculation of mean, min, max, sum, squares
inputs.name: Non-zero Values Flag

inputs.description: Calculate the standard deviation, sqrt(variance), instead of the mean (cannot be used with -sqr, -sum or -non_zero)
inputs.name: Standard Deviation Flag

inputs.description: Average the squares, instead of the values
inputs.name: Average Squares Flag

inputs.description: Just take the sum (don't divide by number of datasets)
inputs.name: Sum Flag

inputs.description: Compute only the count of non-zero voxels
inputs.name: Count Flag

inputs.description: Find the maximum at each voxel
inputs.name: Max Flag

inputs.description: Find the minimum at each voxel
inputs.name: Min Flag

inputs.description: Find maximum absolute value at each voxel
inputs.name: Absolute Max Flag

inputs.description: Find extremes with maximum absolute value but preserve sign
inputs.name: Signed Absolute Max Flag

inputs.description: Sum of N dsets will be weighted by N volume WSET. This weight dataset must be of type float.
inputs.name: Weightset
